title: California Summer Avocado Pie
directions: Blend avocado, lemon juice, lemon zest and sweetened condensed milk until smooth.
Pour mixture into prepared pie crust.
Top with whipped cream and sliced almonds, if desired.
Place pie in refrigerator for 3-4 hours and allow to set.
ingredients: 1	ripe, Fresh California Avocado, seeded, peeled and mashed
As needed	Lemon zest to taste
As needed	Whipped cream, for garnish
As needed	Sliced almonds, for garnish
